GoalDesc: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
TargetDesc: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally
